answers.author: Murray Levison
answers.text:
Kevin,
Take a look at some articles about Dana Point, California:
http://www.westerncity.com/Western-City/July-2010/Challenging-the-IRS-on-the-Status-of-Independent-Contractors
http://www.bbklaw.com/?t=40&an=8067&format=xml
http://centerfornonprofitmanagement.blogspot.com/2012/02/instructors-employees-or-independent.html
You might check with the Calif Parks and Recreation Society to see what they know.
Murray


Kevin,

author: Kevin Safine
text:
The City of Walnut Creek, California is currently going through an audit by the IRS regarding the use of independent contract instructors for our arts and recreation classes.  
My question is, do you know of any other agencies that have previously been audited (or that are working through one now, as we are)?   We are seeking to learn as much as we can about the experience and how to be successful in our approach to the situation.
Thanks for any help you can provide!
title: IRS Audit of Contract Instructors
